events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate on our careers portal this morning.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster as the candidate applied for a software developer role.
A recruiter specialized in technical hiring has been assigned to manage this candidateâ€™s recruitment process.
Completed the initial screening call where the candidate demonstrated strong fundamentals in software development.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to our initial screening and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward.
Scheduled a technical interview with the engineering panel for next week to evaluate coding skills and system design knowledge.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, exhibiting excellent problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss compensation, benefits, and cultural fit with the candidate.
The HR interview went well; the candidate showed alignment with company values and culture.
An offer was formally proposed to the candidate including salary, benefits, and start date details.
Received positive feedback from the candidate accepting the terms in the offer and confirming willingness to join.
The candidate formally accepted the offer and agreed on the scheduled start date for onboarding.
The candidate has started the onboarding process, completing required HR documentation and system access setup.
The hire process is officially closed with the successful integration of the new software engineer into the team.
